item.title: 桑切斯再度挑战特朗普，西班牙押注移民政策
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗·桑切斯正押注于一场大胆的赌博：接纳大批无证移民所带来的好处，将使不可避免的反弹变得值得。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez is pursuing a bold gamble that the benefits of embracing swathes of undocumented immigrants will make the inevitable backlash worthwhile.】

item.title: 新兴市场资产或迎11月以来最糟糕一周
item.description: 新兴市场资产正面临逾两个月来最糟糕的一周，科技股和大宗商品价格的暴跌令其承压。【原文：Emerging market assets are on track for their worst week in more than two months, weighed by a rout in technology shares and commodity prices.】

item.title: Atlassian首席执行官称人工智能对公司有利，科技股下跌之际
item.description: 人工智能是Atlassian公司遭遇的最棒的事情之一，首席执行官迈克·坎农-布鲁克斯如是说。周四尾盘交易时段，该公司公布第二季度财报后股价在美国市场下跌，这发生在更广泛的人工智能驱动科技板块低迷之际。【原文：AI has been one of the best things to happen to Atlassian Corp., Chief Executive Officer Mike Cannon-Brookes said, as shares fell in the US in late Thursday trading following the company’s second-quarter results, amid a broader AI-driven tech sector slump.】

item.title: 印尼财政部长驳斥穆迪下调展望评级
item.description: 印度尼西亚财政部长普尔巴亚·尤迪·萨德瓦驳斥了穆迪评级公司下调该国展望的决定，称该国不断改善的经济增长和受控的财政赤字不太可能导致信用评级下调。【原文：Indonesian Finance Minister Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa pushed back at Moody’s Ratings’ decision to lower the country’s outlook, saying that the nation’s improving growth and controlled deficit were unlikely to result in a credit rating downgrade.】

item.title: 印度维持利率不变，因美印贸易协议提振经济前景
item.description: 印度储备银行周五维持基准利率不变，预测通胀将保持可控水平，同时随着政府在预算中增加支出以及美国宣布意外达成降低关税的贸易协议，经济增长担忧有所缓解。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged on Friday, predicting inflation will remain manageable while growth concerns eased after the government boosted spending in its budget and the US announced a surprise trade deal to lower tariffs.】

item.title: 中国宽松货币政策涌入金属市场，实体经济却步履维艰
item.description: 手握大量现金却缺乏投资渠道的中国投机者，正推高全球金属价格，凸显出监管机构将资本引导至实体经济面临的困境。【原文：With ample cash but fewer investment options, Chinese speculators have fanned a rally in global metals prices, underscoring just how difficult it is for authorities to channel capital into the real economy.】

item.title: 新加坡政府投资公司支持的泰国初创企业考虑在香港或纽约上市
item.description: 由新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）支持的泰国科技初创企业Line Man Wongnai正考虑在海外进行首次公开募股（IPO），以满足更强劲的投资者需求并获得更高估值。此举将表明该公司对本地股市缺乏信心。【原文：Line Man Wongnai, a Thai technology startup backed by Singapore’s GIC Pte, is considering an initial public offering abroad to tap stronger investor demand and secure a higher valuation, a move that would signal a lack of confidence in the local stock market.】

item.title: I Squared称正考虑出售价值20亿美元的数据中心公司BDx
item.description: 知情人士透露，I Squared Capital正考虑出售其亚洲数据中心业务BDx的方案，这标志着人工智能热潮推动的行业中又一潜在交易浮出水面。【原文：I Squared Capital is considering options for its Asian data center business BDx, including a sale, people familiar with the matter said, signaling another potential deal in an industry riding the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 铜价延续跌势，市场焦点再度转向疲软基本面
item.description: 铜价延续自上周创下的历史高点以来的跌势，因市场焦点重新转向需求疲软——此前投机性买盘狂潮曾推动价格脱离基本面走势。【原文：Copper extended its retreat from a record high reached last week as the focus turned back to softening demand following a speculative buying frenzy that saw prices break free from fundamentals.】

item.title: 日本央行理事释放更多加息信号
item.description: 日本央行一名理事强调，为完成政策正常化进程，有必要进一步上调基准利率。这一信号可能助长市场对提前加息的猜测。【原文：A Bank of Japan board member highlighted the need for further increases to the benchmark interest rate in order to complete the process of normalizing policy settings, in a signal that’s likely to sustain emerging speculation over an early rate hike.】

item.title: 印度创始人持股比例降至历史最低点，基金仍持乐观态度
item.description: 本地基金持有的Nifty 500股票比例达到创纪录的20.6%。【原文：Local funds’ ownership of Nifty 500 stocks is at a record high of 20.6%.】

item.title: 普拉博沃使印尼与全球市场走向对抗
item.description:
市场崩盘与一座争议金矿的纷争，正引发更多关于东南亚最大经济体的质疑。

【原文：

A market meltdown and the saga of a contested gold mine is raising more questions about Southeast Asia’s biggest economy.

】

item.title: 蔚来股价大涨，中国电动汽车制造商首次实现季度盈利
item.description: 蔚来汽车股价大涨，此前这家中国电动汽车制造商表示，其很可能实现了首次季度盈利。对于这家多年来耗资数十亿美元挑战特斯拉公司和本土竞争对手的企业而言，这标志着一个转折点。【原文：Nio Inc. shares jumped after the Chinese electric-vehicle maker said it likely posted its first quarterly profit, a watershed moment for a company that has spent years burning through billions of dollars to challenge Tesla Inc. and local rivals.】

item.title: 印尼资产价格下跌，穆迪下调展望拖累市场情绪
item.description: 印尼资产暴跌，因穆迪评级将该国信用展望下调至负面，加剧了投资者情绪的压力。【原文：Indonesia’s assets slumped as the Moody’s Ratings’ credit outlook cut to negative added pressure on investor sentiment.】

item.title: 美国国债收益率曲线逼近四年最陡水平
item.description: 美国国债收益率曲线已逼近四年多来的最陡峭水平，这源于降息举措与对持续通胀及财政赤字的担忧共同作用的结果。【原文：The US Treasury yield curve is near the steepest level in more than four years due to a combination of interest-rate cuts and concern over persistent inflation and the fiscal deficit.】

item.title: 铁矿石跌破100美元，市场基本面"依然疲软"
item.description: 铁矿石价格跌破每吨100美元，因中国农历新年假期前需求放缓，且市场供应充足的迹象不断显现。【原文：Iron ore dipped below $100 a ton, as demand in China slowed before the Lunar New Year break and signs of a well-supplied market stack up.】

item.title: 波兰发行多档次日本国债，创下最大规模纪录
item.description: 随着日本政府债券市场趋于稳定，波兰重返武士债券市场，向投资者提供更高回报率，以期实现融资渠道多元化。【原文：Poland returned to the Samurai market offering higher returns to investors in a bid to diversify its funding as the Japanese government bond market stabilizes.】

item.title: 味之素股价大涨10%，咖啡与调味品业务推动盈利增长
item.description: 味之素公司股价一度大涨10%，创下自2024年11月以来的最大涨幅。此前这家日本调味品制造商公布了超出预期的季度财报，并上调了业务利润预期。【原文：Ajinomoto Co. shares gained as much as 10% in their steepest climb since November 2024 after the Japanese seasoning maker reported better-than-expected quarterly earnings and raised its business profit outlook.】

item.title: 牧元生物上市后瞄准亚洲养猪场，融资14亿美元
item.description: 慕源食品公司计划与亚洲养猪户合作，并加强其全球饲料谷物供应网络。此前该公司通过香港今年迄今规模最大的上市融资，筹集了107亿港元（14亿美元）。【原文：Muyuan Foods Co. plans to partner with Asian pig farmers and enhance its global feed-grain supply network after raising HK$10.7 billion ($1.4 billion) in Hong Kong’s biggest listing of the year so far.】

item.title: 日本大型排放企业抢购碳信用额以应对合规市场
item.description: 东京证券交易所一名官员表示，日本大型污染企业正在该交易所的自愿市场购买碳信用额，此举是在日本强制性碳交易计划启动之前进行的。【原文：Large Japanese polluters are buying carbon credits on the Tokyo Stock Exchange Inc.’s voluntary market ahead of the launch of the nation’s mandatory scheme, according to an official with the bourse.】

item.title: 人工智能竞赛推动科技巨头资本支出飙升至平流层高度
item.description: 美国四大科技巨头共同预测，到2026年其资本支出总额将达到约6500亿美元——这笔令人瞠目的资金将用于新建数据中心及配套设备，包括人工智能芯片、网络电缆和备用发电机等维持数据中心运转的各类设备。【原文：Four of the biggest US technology companies together have forecast capital expenditures that will reach about $650 billion in 2026 — a mind-boggling tide of cash earmarked for new data centers and the long list of equipment needed to make them tick, including artificial intelligence chips, networking cables and backup generators.】

item.title: 软银押注OpenAI投资，日本车企却拖后腿
item.description: 软银集团下周将公布第三季度财报，这将是这家日本科技巨头首次就其考虑增加对OpenAI投资的报道作出回应。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s third-quarter earnings next week will be the first opportunity for the Japanese tech giant to respond to reports it’s considering raising its investment in OpenAI.】

item.title: Coupang影响力活动在华盛顿结交强力盟友
item.description: 本周，美国国会与韩国贸易事务最高官员举行了一场闭门会议，会议焦点集中于一个话题：总部位于西雅图的电商平台Coupang公司——这家企业被誉为"韩国亚马逊"。【原文：A closed-door congressional meeting this week with South Korea’s top trade official was dominated by one topic: Coupang Inc., the Seattle-headquartered e-commerce platform best known as the “Amazon of South Korea.”】

item.title: 鲜为人知的对冲基金交易员在布雷文·霍华德赚取数十亿
item.description:
自2008年开始管理资金以来，米纳尔·巴特瓦尔从未出现过亏损年份。

【原文：

Minal Bathwal hasn’t had a losing year since he started managing money in 2008.

】

item.title: 全球科技股抛售加速，韩国股市暴跌
item.description: 韩国股市暴跌，全球风险资产抛售潮席卷该国部分科技巨头，暴露了这个全球表现最佳市场的脆弱性。【原文：South Korean equities slumped as a global selloff in risk assets swept up some of the country’s tech heavyweights, exposing vulnerability in the world’s best-performing market.】

item.title: 韩国ETF热潮推动资产规模有望超越台湾
item.description: 韩国交易所交易基金（ETF）资产规模即将超越台湾地区，创下2019年以来首次超越纪录，这再次彰显了韩国市场在全球舞台日益凸显的重要性。【原文：In yet another sign of the South Korean market’s rising prominence on the global stage, assets in the nation’s exchange-traded funds are on the verge of overtaking those in Taiwan for the first time since 2019.】

item.title: 华尔街豪赌加密货币后，散户投资者遭重创
item.description: 通过华尔街认可的基金涌入特朗普政府承诺的加密货币天堂的散户投资者，如今正以高昂代价领悟市场重力的法则。【原文：Retail investors who piled into the Trump administration’s promised crypto paradise via Wall Street-approved funds are now learning an expensive lesson in market gravity.】

item.title: 比亚迪600亿美元市值蒸发，预示中国电动车行业深层动荡
item.description: 比亚迪股价的持续抛售正暴露投资者对中国电动车行业盈利前景的忧虑，国内需求降温与原材料成本飙升正引发市场预期的大幅下调。【原文：A relentless selloff in BYD Co. shares is laying bare investor anxiety over the profit outlook for China’s electric-vehicle sector, as cooling demand at home and surging raw material costs trigger a brutal reset of expectations.】

item.title: 白银延续跌势，抛售潮抹去今年涨幅
item.description: 银价下跌，此前一个交易日已暴跌20%，因白银在经历历史性市场暴跌后难以找到支撑位。金价基本持平。【原文：Silver fell, after plunging 20% in the previous session, as the white metal struggled to find a floor following a historic market rout. Gold was little changed.】

item.title: 油价延续跌势，市场聚焦美伊核谈判
item.description: 油价延续三周来最大单日跌幅，因伊朗与美国计划于周五晚些时候举行会谈，缓解了军事冲突和供应中断的迫在眉睫的风险。【原文：Oil extended its biggest one-day drop in three weeks, with planned talks between Iran and the US later on Friday easing the immediate risk of military conflict and supply disruptions.】
